parameters.jsCode:
const body = $input.body;
return {
  id: body.id,
  tenantId: body.tenantId,
  leadId: body.leadId,
  agentId: body.agentId,
  endedAt: body.endedAt,
  duration: body.duration,
  status: body.status,
  transcript: body.transcript,
  summary: body.summary,
  actionTaken: body.actionTaken,
  urgency: body.urgency,
  sentiment: body.sentiment,
  notes: body.notes,
  recordingUrl: body.recordingUrl
};

parameters.responseBody: {{ { error: 'Missing required fields: id, tenantId', success: false } }}

parameters.query: UPDATE call_logs SET {{ $json.leadId !== undefined ? "lead_id = " + ($json.leadId ? "'" + $json.leadId + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.agentId !== undefined ? "agent_id = " + ($json.agentId ? "'" + $json.agentId + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.endedAt !== undefined ? "ended_at = " + ($json.endedAt ? "'" + $json.endedAt + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.duration !== undefined ? "duration = " + $json.duration + "," : "" }} {{ $json.status !== undefined ? "status = '" + $json.status + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.transcript !== undefined ? "transcript = '" + $json.transcript + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.summary !== undefined ? "summary = '" + $json.summary + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.actionTaken !== undefined ? "action_taken = " + ($json.actionTaken ? "'" + $json.actionTaken + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.urgency !== undefined ? "urgency = '" + $json.urgency + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.sentiment !== undefined ? "sentiment = " + ($json.sentiment ? "'" + $json.sentiment + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} {{ $json.notes !== undefined ? "notes = '" + $json.notes + "'," : "" }} {{ $json.recordingUrl !== undefined ? "recording_url = " + ($json.recordingUrl ? "'" + $json.recordingUrl + "'" : 'NULL') + "," : "" }} updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '{{ $json.id }}' AND tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenantId }}'
